          <title>
            <string language="en">Brownian motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brownsche Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement brownien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento brownian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Moto browniano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Του BROWN κίνηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento browniano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a drawing done by French physicist Jean Perrin representing Brownian motion of a particle.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">position</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Zeichnung, die vom 
French Physiker Jean Perrin getan wird, das Brownsche Bewegung eines 
Partikels darstellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un schéma fait par le 
physicien Jean Perrin de French représentant le mouvement brownien 
d'une particule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um desenho feito pelo 
físico Jean Perrin de Francês que representa o movimento brownian de
uma partícula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un'illustrazione fatta 
dal fisico Jean Perrin del French che rappresenta il moto browniano di
una particella.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα σχέδιο που γίνεται 
από το γαλλικό φυσικό Jean Perrin που αντιπροσωπεύει την του
BROWN κίνηση ενός μορίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un gráfico hecho por el 
físico Jean Perrin french que representa el movimiento browniano de 
una partícula.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Partikel</string>
          </keyword>
